0.name: A Hot Side Tunnel.
desc: The tunnel walls glow red from the lava flowing just behind the
hardened rock. Cooled magma has formed a small zephyrs that have
since been cracked and shattered by some powerful force.

1.name: A Hot Passage.
desc: Heat radiates from the walls and floor make it a very uncomfortable
place to be.

2.name: A Large Cavern.
desc: A large intersection has formed here. Lava tunnels branch off from this
large cavern. Unbearable heat radiates from the south while red hot
steal billows from an entrance north.

3.name: A Hot Passage.
desc: Heat radiates from the walls and floor make it a very uncomfortable
place to be.

4.name: A Hot Cavern.
desc: A flow of lava leaks down from the ceiling causing a 'lavafall'. A
small river of lava flows east of here into a small tunnel. It looks
like you can get through without burning your feet.

5.name: A Hot Cave.
desc: Heat radiates from the walls and floor make it a very uncomfortable
place to be.

6.name: A Hot Side Tunnel.
desc: Heat radiates from the walls and floor make it a very uncomfortable
place to be.

7.name: A Hot Passage.
desc: Heat radiates from the walls and floor make it a very uncomfortable
place to be.

8.name: A Lava Filled Cavern.
desc: A lake of magma stretches out across the cavern. Waves of lava flow
out from the center and splash up on the walls sending globes of molten
rock shooting up toward a huge circular opening at the top of the
cavern. The floor of the volcano shifts and cracks as new lava flows
push up from below. If the heat is enough to melt rock, then flesh
will stand no chance

9.name: A Hot Cave.
desc: Pools of magma have formed on the floor. Ripples spread out over
the puddles as though something is moving under the surface

10.name: The Hatchery.
desc: A small cave has opened up. Steam billows in through cracks in the wall
and the heat almost too much to bear. Circles of cold magma have formed
nest like indentations in the floor. Various bits broken shell litter
the ground around the dents. You notice a small crack in the far
wall. is it big enough to enter?

11.name: A Steam Filled Cave.
desc: Steam fills the cave making it impossible to breath. Shelves of rock
have been cut away in the cave sides and in the centre a pool of
water bubbles and spits as it boils.

12.name: A Narrow Tunnel.
desc: The tunnel is perfectly round and very narrow. Pipes carrying hot lava
disappear along the corridor to the east.

13.name: A Narrow Tunnel.
desc: The tunnel seems slightly larger here but the pipes still run along
the bottom of th wall. It is noticably cooler here, but its still
hot as hell.

14.name: A Cavern.
desc: A cavern has opened up. Pipes filter into the room from the walls and
ceiling ending in large vats that continually fill with boiling lava.
Its hot in here, but much more bearable. Lumps of magma seem to move
of the own accord across the vat surface. You notice a door across
the cave.

15.name: A Work Room.
desc: The room is dominated by a huge table made of cooled lava. Small flames
dance across its surface and occasionally murge to form humanoid shapes
then disperse once more. Phials and bottles fill a shelf at the back
of the work room.

16.name: A Blistering Hot Tunnel.
desc: The walls glow red with the heat from the lava flowing behind them.
The floor is almost to hot to stand on as it slops down toward the
passage end. The heat from further down makes your eyes water.

17.name: " A Hot Side Tunnel
desc: A stream of lava flows west into the next cavern. The heat has
started to make you uncomfortable.

18.name: " A Hot Side Tunnel
desc: Lava still flows West but the stream is becoming wider. The heat is
also getting more intense.

19.name: " A Hot Side Tunnel
desc: The stream has turned into a river of lava. A ledge enables you to
continue into the next cavern. The heat is almost unbearable.

20.name: A Lava Lake.
desc: A lake of lava spreads out before you. Islands of rock float along
on currents within the lake. Something seems to be stirring under
the lava.

21.name: On The Lava Lake.
desc: The lava boils and pops showering red hot molten rock over the
entire cavern. The platform you are stood on rocks as waves of magma
crash against it side.

name: The ledge crumbles beneath your feet dropping you onto one of the
floating rock

23.name: A Rough Walled Passage.
desc: Heat, fumes and pitful moans flood the passage. Anything living
in these conditions must be hardy creatures with a liking for heat.
The passage ahead look like it curves round to the south.

24.name: A Rough Walled Passage.
desc: The heat, although bearable, is quite uncomfortable. The sound of
rocks cracking under intense heat can be heard further down the passage.

25.name: A Rough Walled Passage.
desc: The heat from the west has increased noticably. Your nose is
starting to sting from the acrid fumes coming into the passage.

26.name: A Rough Walled Passage.
desc: The heat from the west has increased noticably. Your nose is
starting to sting from the acrid fumes coming into the passage

27.name: A Rough Walled Passage.
desc: The walls of the cave are getting warmer to the touch. The smell of
of sulphur is getting a little stronger.

28.name: A Rough Walled Passage.
desc: The walls of the cave are getting warmer to the touch. The smell of
of sulphur is getting a little stronger.

29.name: A Rough Walled Passage.
desc: The walls of the cave are getting warmer to the touch. The smell of
of sulphur is getting a little stronger.

30.name: A Rough Walled Cave.
desc: A rough walled cave stretches out to the west. A warm breeze drifts
from the west and the faint smell of sulphur tickles your nose.
